=== Mekso: ge’a, ki’o, pi ===

li 2 te’a 3
---
(source_file (mex (li) (number) (mex_operator) (number)))

li 1000 ki’o 234
---
(source_file (mex (li) (number) (mex_operator) (number)))

li 3 pi 14
---
(source_file (mex (li) (number) (mex_operator) (number)))

li 2 ge’a 3
---
(source_file (mex (li) (number) (mex_operator) (number)))
